pages.text: 55|17|teraemi du'i udayacala arau du'i astacalara pratipalaka.
55|18|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|19|teraem du'i sagaraka prabahita karae, ubhaye paraspara milita haya
55|20|kintu sihamta ubhayara majata ache eta antaraala, yito sihamte atikrama karaiba noraarae.
55|21|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|22|ubhaya sagarara paraa utpanna haya mukuta arau poraala.
55|23|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|24|arau sagarata bicaranasila parbata sadrsa nauyanasamuha te'omrae'i (niyantranadhina)
55|25|eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|26|bhuprsthata yi ache sakalo dhbansasila
55|27|arau abinasbara kerala tomara pratipalakara ceharaa, yijana mahimamaya, mahanubhara
55|28|eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|29|akasamandala arau prthiraita yisakala ache, sakalorae te'omra ocarata praarthi, te'om pratito muhurttate gurautbapurna kamata niyojita.
55|30|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|31|he manara arau jina! Ami anatipalame tomalokara (hicapa-nikaca grahanara) prati manonibesa karaima.
55|32|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|33|he jina arau manara sampradaya! Akasamandala arau prthiraira sima yadi tomaloke atikrama karaiba paraa tente atikrama karaa, kintu tomaloke (allahara) saktibihina atikrama karaiba noraaraiba.
55|34|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|35|tomaloka ubhayara prati praerana karaa ha’ba agnisikha arau dhumrapunja, tetiya tomaloke pratiraodha karaiba noraaraiba.
55|36|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|37|yidina akasa bidirna ha’ba se'idina i tejabarna golapara darae rana chalara raupa dharana karaiba
55|38|eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|39|gatike se'idina manuhako tara aparaadha samparke sodha naha’ba arau jinako nahaya.
55|40|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
